info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 12:22AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 100 AM MST... At 1221 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Desert Ridge Marketplace, or near Scottsdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Scottsdale Airport, Desert Ridge Marketplace, McDowell Mountain Park and Rio Verde. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 51 between mile markers 11 and 15. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 28 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
